Class.Name: Flyweight
Class.Description: A collection of generic design patterns, mostly from the 'Gang of Four' book.

Function.Name: get_flyweight
Function.Description: Returns a flyweight object for a given key

Function.Name: add_flyweight
Function.Description: Internal function to add the flyweight obect

Function.Name: remove_flyweight
Function.Description: Removes a flyweight object matching a key

Function.Name: create_flyweight
Function.Description: Overridable function to create a new objects for a key
